article: israel 's defense ministry wants to move a separation fence between israel and the palestinians further eastward to encompass a larger chunk of the west bank and more jewish settlements , a spokeswoman said sunday .
abstract: israeli defense ministry recommends taking larger chunks of west bank in fence construction
